Package model

Class ControllerMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ControllerMethods
  • public class ControllerMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Created this class to reduce redundancy throughout program. Contains methods only used within controller classes.

        public static boolean checkForInvalidEntries​(javafx.scene.control.TextField testField)
        This method is used to check for invalid entries that may be submitted. Invalid entries include: null or empty
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • checkForInvalidInventory

        public static boolean checkForInvalidInventory​(int inv,
                                               int min,
                                               int max)
        Checks inventory validity. Inventory(Stock) must be with range of min-max. Parameters must be non-negative integers. min must also be less than max
        Parameters:
        inv - Inventory(stock)
        min - Minimum stock
        max - Maximum stock
        Returns:
        boolean

        public static boolean deleteConfirmationPopup()

        Returns:
        Boolean value. True if user selects yes.

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber​(java.lang.String string)
        Checking to see if input is a number to determine which search to use
        Parameters:
        string - Input being checked
        Returns:
        Boolean value. True if number.

      • productPriceValidation

        public static boolean productPriceValidation​(double productPrice,
                                             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> associatedParts)
        Check to see if product price is valid. For a price to be valid: product price >= sum of associated parts price
        Parameters:
        productPrice - Product price
        associatedParts - Associated parts checked
        Returns:
        Boolean value. True if price is valid
